meanings.definition: Having a shiny or reflective surface.
meanings.sent1: The car had a glossy finish that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She loved the glossy look of the polished marble floor.
meanings.sent3: The glossy mirror made her reflection look like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: The glossy lake reflected the colors of the sunset like a painting.
meanings.sent5: The glossy apple was so shiny, it almost looked like a mirror.

meanings.definition: A magazine or publication printed on shiny paper.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading the glossy filled with fashion tips.
meanings.sent2: The glossy featured stunning photographs of exotic locations.
meanings.sent3: He used the glossy to swat a fly, making it a stylish fly swatter.
meanings.sent4: The glossy was a window into the world of celebrity gossip.
meanings.sent5: The glossy was so vibrant and eye-catching that it stood out on the shelf.
